messages.subject: Mighty Mud Mania or AZ Science Center
messages.msgSnippet: Is anyone going to the Scottsdale s annual Mighty Mud Mania on Friday?  If you want some info. on it I compiled & saved it.  I didn t want to send it
messages.messageBody:
Is anyone going to the Scottsdale's annual Mighty Mud Mania on Friday? If
you want some info. on it I compiled & saved it. I didn't want to send it
unsolicited in case it would upset anyone. I also have compiled some info.
on the Arizona Science Center if you want me to send it to you let me know.
=)

Tonya
Brittany & Melody's Mommy
4/22/99 12/01/01




The secret to life isn't getting what you want it's wanting it once you get
it-Katherine Hepburn in "Love Affair"

Remember starting the fire is easy, the hardest part is learning how to keep
the flame-Stevie Nicks "Love's A Hard Game To Play" Timespace
